identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

heading.usage: All headings (h1-h6), Hero text, Big Stats

body.usage: Paragraphs, UI elements, Buttons, Data tables

rules: Overlines must be uppercase + tracking-widest + text-xs
Use font-light for large display numbers to add elegance

primary.name: Gorontalo Emerald
primary.usage: Primary buttons, Active states, Key icons

secondary.name: Prosperity Gold
secondary.usage: Accents, Warnings, Highlights, Government insignia details

tracing_beam.description: Animated gradient border for high-priority cards
tracing_beam.usage: Top Contributing OPD Card, Call to Action

textures.noise: Use a subtle noise overlay on the hero section to reduce digital flatness
textures.pattern: Topographic map lines (SVG) at 5% opacity in the background of the dashboard

shadows.sharp: shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] (Use sparingly for 'Neo-Brutalist' accents if needed)

spacing.base: Generous. Use p-8 or p-12 for section padding.
spacing.containers: p-6 or p-8 internal padding for cards.

dashboard.name: Control Room Grid (Mode B)
dashboard.rules: Dense data. No jagged bottoms. Use col-span-2 for main charts.

landing.name: Tetris Grid (Mode A)
landing.rules: Asymmetry. Hero = col-span-full. Stats = col-span-4. Images = col-span-6.

buttons.interaction: Scale down slightly on click (active:scale-95). Hover: lift (-translate-y-0.5).

cards.style: Flat white background, 1px border (slate-200), soft shadow.
cards.hover: Border color shifts to Emerald-200, shadow increases.

inputs.style: bg-slate-50 border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-emerald-500/20 focus:border-emerald-500 transition-all

maps.library: React Leaflet or Simple SVG Map
maps.style: Clean, light mode tiles. Custom markers (Tree icons).

hero_bg.alt: Aerial view of lush green forest road

participation.usage: Call to Action / Participation Form Header

guidelines: Use layoutId for smooth transitions between tabs/pages.
Micro-interactions: Scale 0.98 on tap for buttons.
Page transitions: Simple opacity fade + y-axis slide (y: 20 -> y: 0).

universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure text contrast ratio > 4.5:1. Use aria-labels for icon-only buttons.
universal_guidelines.testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (e.g., 'submit-participation-btn').
universal_guidelines.code_style: Use named exports for components, default exports for pages. No 'Inter' font.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Form Partisipasi ASN' with fields: Email, Nama, NIP, OPD (dropdown), Alamat, WhatsApp, Jumlah Pohon, Jenis Pohon, Lokasi Tanam.
Create a 'Super Admin' panel with JWT auth (mocked is fine if backend not ready, but structure it for real auth).
Use 'Recharts' for the Tree Statistics (Bar chart for OPD contribution, Pie chart for Tree Types).
The 'Peta Penanaman' should be simple (as per user choice) - use a static map image with interactive pins or a simple Leaflet map.
Export functionality: Use 'jspdf' for PDF and 'xlsx' for Excel export.
Ensure the 'Hero Section' is editable by Admin (store text/image URL in state/db).
